Kashira:
Bannai (伴内)

Category: Male

– Click image to view.

Plays:

The Love of Osome and Hisamatsu (Somemoyō imose no kadomatsu / 染模様妹背門松)

The Vendetta in Iga (Iga-goe dōchū sugoroku / 伊賀越道中双六)

The Shank's Mare along the Tokaido Highway (Tōkai dōchu hizakurige / 東海道中膝栗毛)

The Dancing Mushrooms (Maidake / 舞い茸)

Sasayaki no take (Sasayaki no take / ささやきの竹)
